title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Yakutat & Coastal Area
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Yakutat & Coastal Area             Yakutat and Coastal Area         The Yakutat and Coastal Area is located at the south end of the park. It contains the Yakutat District Office and more than 150 miles of coastline. Click on the map for a larger image.    Yakutat and Coastal Area Accessible only by plane or boat, this area encompasses the park's coastal region, with 155 miles of little-known coastline. Here, huge mountains, enormous glaciers, and temperate rainforest meet the ocean. Visitor services are only found in town of Yakutat, which is a plane or boat ride away from the park. Follow the below links to discover this area:  Â      .
